name: Eduard Constantin Dragut
content: Eduard Dragut - Homepage Eduard C. Dragut About Me Research Publications Presentations Teaching Curiculum Vitae Service Personal Quick Picks Contact Information Email: edragut@temple.edu Phone: 215-204-0521 Address: SERC (Room 348), 1925 N. 12th Street, Philadelphia, PA, 19122 Associate Professor Ph.D. in Computer Science from University of Illinois at Chicago. M.S. from University of Iowa. B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Bucharest. Research Interests Databases; Information retrieval, extraction, cleaning, and integration; Opinion mining and retrieval; Web data management; Cyber-infrastructure for science Current Activity Record Linkage and Fusion with Yongquan Dong and Weiyi Meng Normalization of Duplicate Records from Multiple Sources in IEEE TKDE'19. Deep Learning for Entity Recognition Shanshan and Lihong's paper How to Invest my Time: Lessons from Human-in-the-Loop Entity Extraction accepted in SIGKDD'19. Sentiment Analysis with Marjan Hosseinia and Arjun Mukherjee at UH. Pro/Con: Neural Detection of Stance in Argumentative Opinion accepted in SBP-BRiMS'19. News Mining Lihong's paper On the dynamics of user engagement in news comment media accepted in WIREs Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery. with Marija Stanojevic, Jumanah Alshehri, and Zoran Obradovic. Biased News Data Influence on Classifying Social Media Posts accepted in NewsIR'19. I will teach Principles of Database Systems in Fall 2019. Professional Service: Chair SIGMOD/PODS PhD Symposium 2016, San Francisco, USA. Chair ICDE PhD Symposium 2015, Chicago, USA. PC Member: SIGMOD 2016, SIGMOD 2015, EMNLP 2015, DASFAA 2015, INFOCOM 2015, NAACL-HLT 2015, WWW 2014, COLING 2014, DASFAA 2014, ADBIS 2014 Referee for TKDE, TWEB, TSC, TiiS, ISJ, TKDD, JWS, WWWJ. Served on NSF CISE/IIS panels in 2016. Books Deep Web Query Interface Understanding and Integration, co-authored with Weiyi Meng and Clement Yu. Download here.
